title: Experienced Player Looking for League Team to play with in evenings [any role is fine]

embed.description: SudsyMcGee / Silver 4 27LP / 120W 119L Win Ratio 50% / Thresh - 14W 20L Win Ratio 41%, Riven - 13W 20L Win Ratio 39%, Irelia - 14W 13L Win Ratio 52%, Brand - 17W 9L Win Ratio 65%, Rengar - 12W 10L Win Ratio 55%

body:
Hey Guys,

I am an experienced clear communicating league player who has played exclusively ranked on a casual basis since season 2. I am glad OCE finally has normal draft pick for practising. I am comfortable macro shot calling for teams and is how I win games even when my mechanical skill is off for the day, I am lacking in my team-fight shot calling however and it is something I would love to learn. I am a jack-of-all trades player but my most comprehensive experience on a single champion is Irelia (600ish games across multiple accounts over 4 years) and Riven (300ish games across multiple accounts over 4 years) which I spent many many 100's of games learning then piloted a alt account in season 6 to gold 1 maining those two champions. I am most comfortable in top lane however in solo queue I have found brand support is my most reliable champion for carrying games.

I currently reside in silver 4 but have made little to no effort to climb this season so far. I was placed bronze 3 and through the games I have played comfortable climbed out while teaching new players. I can swiftly pick up new champions and perform on them allowing me to enhance the strength of other more specialist players on a team or craft win conditions in team comps.

I do not have any role preferences and have played everything but mid lane comfortably at high silver / low gold.

I have experience playing in teams before and this has taught me to be Kind and forward thinking in game and constructive and critical post game. I am also happy to review matches played in my own time to help give constructive feedback so we can all improve together. I have played with diamond and master tier players and bronze players alike and I am willing to put in effort to improve mechanics if that is what is necessary however I prefer to alter my play-style to be able to work around our strongest and most reliable players. Be it picking up a champion to shove and assist for invades to assist the jungler or playing a support that can set up an ADC for success or even playing nunu to guarantee map control.

I enjoy support, jungle and top lane the most but would be happy to pickup ADC once more for a fun team (see my kogmaw winrate last season that got me temporarily banned because they thought I was scripting >_>)

I have sport commitments on monday evenings and Tabletop RPG commitments on some other evenings but I am happy to move my schedule around for a good group of people that enjoy the game :). I live in SA.
